      Set the image quality displaying, lower image quality has a better performance.

        public DisplayOption.Builder imageQuality(ImageQuality quality)

        返回:

      • oneAfterOne

        public DisplayOption.Builder oneAfterOne()
        Display the image one by one, by default will display loaded images at the same time.
        返回:

      • viewMaybeReused

        public DisplayOption.Builder viewMaybeReused()
        Indicate that the view may be reused, the image won't be set if there is a new request for the same view.
        返回:
        Instance of this builder.
